name: Black Bean Tuna Salad
author: my3girls
summary: This quick, cool summer or fall salad is very filling and suitable for a light-meal main dish.
ingredients: ½ (15 ounce) can black beans, rinsed and drained
1 (5 ounce) can tuna, drained and flaked
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook elbow macaroni in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, 8 minutes; drain
Rinse macaroni with cold water until cooled completely; drain and transfer to a large bowl
Mix black beans, tuna, mayonnaise, green onions, bacon bits, lemon juice, and black pepper with the macaroni
Cover the bowl with plastic wrap and refrigerate until chilled
